execution_plan.description: Count customers grouped by country in the central users database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT country AS country, COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM customers WHERE country IS NOT NULL GROUP BY country;

execution_plan.description: Count customers grouped by country in the EU sales database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT country AS country, COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM customers WHERE country IS NOT NULL GROUP BY country;

execution_plan.description: Count customers grouped by country in the US sales database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT country AS country, COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM customers WHERE country IS NOT NULL GROUP BY country;
